main.name: Francisco Guedes
main.occupation: junior developer and data analyst enthusiast
main.bio: Passionate about technology and programming, I have been looking for training in this area. My entire professional experience has been focused on Customer Centric and problem solving with a strong commitment to customer satisfaction. From 2012 untill 2020 worked in the Tourism and Hospitality sector in award winning establishments all over Europe. Currently working in Teleperformance, Lisbon, seeking a Junior Developer position to leverage my professional expertise and career. In my spare time I'm working on my side projects as a programmer, listening to Economic and Financial podcasts, reading about inspiring world leaders and working on my mind and body.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

testimonials.text: Work fast and get shit done.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
